data.title: St. George Catholic Church
data.meta_description: Sunday at 7 a.m. and 9:30 a.m. Monday Communion Service at 7 a.m. Tuesday - Saturday Daily Mass at 7 a.m.  Saturday (Sunday Liturgy, fulfills Sunday obligation) at 6 p.m.
data.text:
Mass Schedule

Sunday at 7 a.m. and 9:30 a.m.

Monday Communion Service at 7 a.m.

Tuesday - Saturday Daily Mass at 7 a.m.

Saturday (Sunday Liturgy, fulfills Sunday obligation) at 6 p.m.

Reconciliation (Confession)

Saturday from 5:15 - 5:45 p.m. or by appoi​ntment

baptism

Please call the parish office to schedule. Communion may also be arranged for the homebound.

Devotions

Adoration of the Blessed Sacrament

First Friday at 6 p.m.

Rosary

Monday - Saturday at 6:30 a.m.

Devotion to Blessed Virgin Mary

First Saturday of the month at 5:15 p.m.

Divine Mercy Chaplet and Prayers

Every Sunday at 3 p.m. in the church

Second Sunday of the month at 11 a.m.

​

Our Lady of Perpetual Help Novena

Tuesday at 6:30 a.m.

Respect Life Rosary

First Wednesday of the month at noon in the Meditation Garden

Fatima Rosary

13th day of the month at noon in the Meditation Garden

​Novena to St. Joseph

19th day of the month at noon in the Meditation Garden

Parish Staff

Fr. Raymund Ellorin, Pastor

John Tolentino, Deacon

Kamalani Rodrigues, Administrative Support

​Vicky DeSilva, Director of Religious Education

Celia Chun-Wright, Music Director

Jackie Burnett, Bookkeeper

Lucy Pascual, Accountant

Paul Burnett, Grounds & Maintenance

Parish Office Hours

Tuesday - Friday, 9 a.m. - noon
